name: MalnutritionScreeningAtRiskResult
title: Malnutrition Screening At Risk Result
description: Modified original value set of similar concept with the purpose to be used for the malnutrition eCQM instead of 3 separate values
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values indicates that a patient was found to be at risk for malnutrition after completing a malnutrition screening done by the health care professional.),(Data Element Scope: Data included in this set represent that an individual has been evaluated to be at risk for malnutrition.),(Inclusion Criteria: Malnutrition At Risk criteria from the SNOMED-CT terminology are included.),(Exclusion Criteria: Malnutrition At Risk criteria from other terminologies than SNOMED-CT.)

concept.display: At risk for imbalanced nutrition, less than body requirements (finding)
At risk for inadequate intake of multiple nutrients (finding)
At risk of deficient food intake (finding)

contains.display: At increased risk for nutritional problem (finding)
At risk for imbalanced nutrition, less than body requirements (finding)
At increased risk of nutritional deficit (finding)
At risk of deficient food intake (finding)
